page.title: 10THE OAKS AND THE ACORNS
page.content: This is a{Centre for handicapped people both young and old. The building is 8 years old and there are normally 35 residents.When we visited there were only 28.We went to see a nice lady called Vera,who has lived there for 8 years.She likes it a lot because you can do what you want,and you can pick your own room.Vera does her own shopping in the Arndale Centre and gets there by taxi.On Sundays she goes to St.Lukes Church and meets her friends there.During the week she does her needlework,plays dominoes,watches T.V,and also plays billiards.There is a little cafe where she can buy a meal but she can also be private and quiet in her own room.She likes Jack Lord and has a picture of him.Although pets are allowed,Vera has not got one,but she would like to have a cat and a dog.She seems to be very happy here.
